system.description: “Turns out, rushing a hack only impresses the ICE.” If you take at least 1 minute to study a device before attempting to hack it, gain advantage on your next Spellcasting (Hacking) roll against that system this scene.
system.effect: If you take at least 1 minute to study a device before attempting to hack it, gain advantage on your next Spellcasting (Hacking) roll against that system this scene.
system.blurb: “Turns out, rushing a hack only impresses the ICE.”
